text: @realDonaldTrump You want us to forget COVID-19 unless we lost a family member or friend? Deaths of people you don’t know are to be forgotten? Just *poof* and it’s out of your mind? So school shootings are to be forgotten because it wasn’t your kid? You’re a sociopath.
